column2:
ขอ ไข่
khaawᴿ khàiᴸ
Class:High
Initial Sound:kh-
Final Sound:-k
Meaning:egg
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ข.mp3]
High-class consonant. The 'kh' sound is aspirated, like in 'kite'.

ฉอ ฉิ่ง
chaawᴿ chîngᴸ
Class:High
Initial Sound:ch-
Final Sound:-
Meaning:cymbal
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฉ.mp3]
High-class consonant. Aspirated 'ch' sound.

ถอ ถุง
thaawᴿ thǔngᴿ
Class:High
Initial Sound:th-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:bag
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ถ.mp3]
High-class consonant. Aspirated 't' sound.

ผอ ผึ้ง
phaawᴿ phûengᴸ
Class:High
Initial Sound:ph-
Final Sound:-
Meaning:bee
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ผ.mp3]
High-class consonant. Aspirated 'p' sound.

ฝอ ฝา
faawᴿ fáaᴹ
Class:High
Initial Sound:f-
Final Sound:-
Meaning:lid
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฝ.mp3]
High-class consonant. The 'f' sound as in 'fan'.

ศอ ศาลา
saawᴿ sǎaᴹ-laaᴹ
Class:High
Initial Sound:s-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:pavilion
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ศ.mp3]
High-class consonant. Same sound as ส. Used in Sanskrit/Pali loanwords.

ษอ ฤาษี
saawᴿ rʉʉᴹ-sǐiᴿ
Class:High
Initial Sound:s-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:hermit
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ษ.mp3]
High-class consonant. Same sound as ส. Used in Sanskrit/Pali loanwords.

สอ เสือ
saawᴿ sǔeaᴿ
Class:High
Initial Sound:s-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:tiger
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ส.mp3]
High-class consonant. The 's' sound as in 'see'.

หอ หีบ
haawᴿ hìipᴸ
Class:High
Initial Sound:h-
Final Sound:-
Meaning:box
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ห.mp3]
High-class consonant. The 'h' sound as in 'hat'.

กอ ไก่
gaawᴹ gaiᴸ
Class:Mid
Initial Sound:g-
Final Sound:-k
Meaning:chicken
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ก.mp3]
This is the first consonant in the Thai alphabet. It represents the 'g' sound as in 'go'.

จอ จาน
jaawᴹ jaanᴹ
Class:Mid
Initial Sound:j-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:plate
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_จ.mp3]
The 'j' sound as in 'jam'.

ฎอ ชฎา
daawᴹ cháᴴ-daaᴹ
Class:Mid
Initial Sound:d-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:headdress
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฎ.mp3]
Same sound as ด. Used in Sanskrit/Pali loanwords.

ฏอ ปฏัก
dtaawᴹ bpaᴹ-dtàkᴸ
Class:Mid
Initial Sound:dt-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:goad
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฏ.mp3]
Same sound as ต. Used in Sanskrit/Pali loanwords.

ดอ เด็ก
daawᴹ dèkᴸ
Class:Mid
Initial Sound:d-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:child
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ด.mp3]
The 'd' sound as in 'dog'.

ตอ เต่า
dtaawᴹ dtàoᴸ
Class:Mid
Initial Sound:dt-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:turtle
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ต.mp3]
The 'dt' sound as in 'stop'.

บอ ใบไม้
baawᴹ baiᴹ-máaiᴸ
Class:Mid
Initial Sound:b-
Final Sound:-p
Meaning:leaf
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_บ.mp3]
The 'b' sound as in 'boy'.

ปอ ปลา
bpaawᴹ bplaaᴹ
Class:Mid
Initial Sound:bp-
Final Sound:-p
Meaning:fish
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ป.mp3]
The 'bp' sound as in 'spin'.

ออ อ่าง
aawᴹ àangᴸ
Class:Mid
Initial Sound:ʔ-
Final Sound:-
Meaning:basin
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_อ.mp3]
The glottal stop sound. Also used as a vowel carrier.

คอ ควาย
khaawᴹ khwaaiᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:kh-
Final Sound:-k
Meaning:buffalo
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ค.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ข but different tone rules.

ฆอ ระฆัง
khaawᴹ ráᴴ-khangᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:kh-
Final Sound:-k
Meaning:bell
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฆ.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ค.

งอ งู
ngaawᴹ nguuᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:ng-
Final Sound:-ng
Meaning:snake
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ง.mp3]
The 'ng' sound as in 'sing'. Only appears at the end of syllables in Thai.

ชอ ช้าง
chaawᴹ cháaᴴng
Class:Low
Initial Sound:ch-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:elephant
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ช.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ฉ but different tone rules.

ซอ โซ่
saawᴹ sôᴰh
Class:Low
Initial Sound:s-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:chain
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ซ.mp3]
The 's' sound as in 'see'.

ฌอ เฌอ
chaawᴹ chəəᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:ch-
Final Sound:-
Meaning:tree
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฌ.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ช.

ญอ หญิง
yaawᴹ yĭngᴿ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:y-
Final Sound:-n
Meaning:woman
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ญ.mp3]
The 'y' sound as in 'yes'. Also used for final 'n' sound.

ฑอ มณโฑ
thaawᴹ monᴹ-thooᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:th-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:Mandodari
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฑ.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ท. Used in Sanskrit/Pali loanwords.

ฒอ ผู้เฒ่า
thaawᴹ phûuᴸ-thâoᴰ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:th-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:elder
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฒ.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ท. Used in Sanskrit/Pali loanwords.

ณอ เณร
naawᴹ naynᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:n-
Final Sound:-n
Meaning:novice monk
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ณ.mp3]
Same sound as น. Used in Sanskrit/Pali loanwords.

ทอ ทหาร
thaawᴹ tháᴴ-hǎanᴿ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:th-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:soldier
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ท.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ถ but different tone rules.

ธอ ธง
thaawᴹ thongᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:th-
Final Sound:-t
Meaning:flag
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ธ.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ท.

นอ หนู
naawᴹ nǔuᴿ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:n-
Final Sound:-n
Meaning:mouse
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_น.mp3]
The 'n' sound as in 'no'.

พอ พาน
phaawᴹ phaanᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:ph-
Final Sound:-p
Meaning:tray
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_พ.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ผ but different tone rules.

ฟอ ฟัน
faawᴹ fanᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:f-
Final Sound:-p
Meaning:teeth
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฟ.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ฝ but different tone rules.

ภอ สำเภา
phaawᴹ sǎmᴹ-phaoᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:ph-
Final Sound:-p
Meaning:junk
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ภ.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as พ.

มอ แมว
maawᴹ maewᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:m-
Final Sound:-m
Meaning:cat
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ม.mp3]
The 'm' sound as in 'man'.

ยอ ยักษ์
yaawᴹ yákᴴ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:y-
Final Sound:-
Meaning:giant
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ย.mp3]
The 'y' sound as in 'yes'.

รอ เรือ
raawᴹ rʉaᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:r-
Final Sound:-n
Meaning:boat
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ร.mp3]
The 'r' sound as in 'run'.

ลอ ลิง
laawᴹ lingᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:l-
Final Sound:-n
Meaning:monkey
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ล.mp3]
The 'l' sound as in 'let'.

วอ แหวน
waawᴹ wǎenᴿ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:w-
Final Sound:-
Meaning:ring
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ว.mp3]
The 'w' sound as in 'wet'.

ฬอ จุฬา
laawᴹ jùᴸ-laaᴹ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:l-
Final Sound:-n
Meaning:kite
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฬ.mp3]
Same sound as ล. Used in Sanskrit/Pali loanwords.

ฮอ นกฮูก
haawᴹ nókᴰ-hûukᴸ
Class:Low
Initial Sound:h-
Final Sound:-
Meaning:owl
[sound:cheat_sheet_consonant_ฮ.mp3]
Low-class consonant. Same sound as ห but different tone rules.
